SEARCH
Package fooddatacentral

Class FoodDataCentral

java.lang.Object
fooddatacentral.FoodDataCentral
public class FoodDataCentral extends Object
FoodDataCentral class that wraps the REST API provided by the FDC. Must be instantiated with an API key to utilize.

  • Constructor Details

    • FoodDataCentral

      public FoodDataCentral(String apiKey)
      Constructor for the FoodDataCentral class. Requires an API key for the FDC API in order to use.
      Parameters:
      apiKey - to make REST calls with

  • Method Details

    • getFood

      public Optional<Food> getFood(String fdcId)
      Retrieves the specified food item from the FDC database of Branded food items if it is present.
      Parameters:
      fdcId - the id of the food item to retrieve
      Returns:
      an Optional of the Food item. Present if the item was returned from the API, empty if not.

    • getFoods

      public Iterator<Food> getFoods(List<String> fdcIds)
      Retrieves up to 20 food items specified by FDC IDs provided. Invalid IDs or items not found are omitted from the returned values. An empty iterator will be returned if none are found.
      Parameters:
      fdcIds - List of fdc ids related to food items to retrieve.
      Returns:
      an Iterator of all found food items
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter is null or exceeds a size of 20 items.

    • listFoods

      public Iterator<Food> listFoods(int pageNumber)
      Retrieve a list of food items for pagination. Specify the page number to return. The default page size is 50. Returns an empty iterator for any invalid page number.
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - which page to return
      Returns:
      an iterator containing all the food items on the corresponding page for the currently set page size.

    • listFoods

      public Iterator<Food> listFoods(int pageNumber, FoodSortableAttributes sortBy, SortOrder sortOrder)
      Retrieve a list of food items for pagination. Specify the page number to return. The default page size is 50. Specify what attribute of the food to order by and how to order it. Returns an empty iterator for any invalid page number.
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - which page to return
      sortBy - which attribute to sort by
      sortOrder - the order to sort the food
      Returns:
      an iterator containing all the food items on the corresponding page for the currently set page size.

    • getPageSize

      public int getPageSize()
      Returns current page size for listFoods.
      Returns:
      int representing the current number of items on a page returned in listFoods

    • setPageSize

      public void setPageSize(int pageSize)
      Sets page size returned in listFoods to specified number. Note that the performance of listFoods may be impacted by larger numbers.
      Parameters:
      pageSize - number that each page will return in listFoods. Cannot be negative.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if pageSize < 0.

    • searchFoods

      public Iterator<Food> searchFoods(SearchQuery query)
      Searches the list via the given query.
      Parameters:
      query - how to query the food database
      Returns:
      iterator of the found food items. If not found, will be empty
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - for null argument
